statements: UPDATE customer_interactions SET inquiry = 'New inquiry', interaction_type = 'Email' WHERE interaction_id = 1;

UPDATE feedback_quality_assurance SET quality_rating = 4, feedback_comments = 'Great service overall' WHERE id = 3;
